name: Babylone's Aurora
description: Incident at the Scarlet Devil Mansion
author: Exioloz, PinkySmile, second degree

scenarios.name: Spring Cleaning
scenarios.description:
2A 3A 66B |
Basic combo conversion for far melee pokes.
3A only combo into 66B on ground

scenarios.name: Umbra's Presence
scenarios.description:
5AAA 2B 5C d.236B |
The best corner carry !
It is better to start 5AAA with dash momentum
and let more B and C knives hit.
This also will allow you to limit.

scenarios.name: A Lead To Answers
scenarios.description:
66B SC205 |
Best (only) way to follow-up 66B.
Also works with Luminous Ricochet.

scenarios.name: A Rabbit Foot For Luck
scenarios.description:
3A hj.9 j.5A j.6A j.6C |
You can combo from 3A,
if you hit it high enough.
The opposing character can not air tech
after 3A.

scenarios.name: Half Baked Phantasm
scenarios.description:
66C hj.9/D9/D6 j.2A 66C|
Basic 66C CH combo,
works everywhere.
You have to do some adjustment
depending on how you hit 66C.

j8A j5B j9D/j66 j6A/j8A |
j8A combo near-corner/corner.

5AAA 2B hjc.9 j.2B j.66/D6/D3 j.5A 5AAAA |
Common Midscreen BnB.
Doesn't work on midgets
and most crouching characters.
